entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Dir
entry.label: Input directory
entry.help_brief: Path to input files. {cb;GUI;/data/sims/ltrans/sabgom_roms}

entry.name: /LTRANS/SitePrefix
entry.label: Site prefix:
entry.help_brief: Site prefix for input/output files.

entry.name: /LTRANS/CasePrefix
entry.label: Case prefix:
entry.help_brief: Case prefix for input/output files.

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/numpar
entry.label: Number of particles:
entry.help_brief: Number of Lagrangian particles to track

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/parfile
entry.label: Initial particle location filename:
entry.help_brief: Initial particle location filename

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/days
entry.label: Number of days to run model:
entry.help_brief: Number of days to run the model

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/idt
entry.label: Particle tracking (internal) timestep:
entry.help_brief: Particle tracking (internal) timestep [seconds]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/dt
entry.label: Hydrodynamic model (external) timestep:
entry.help_brief: Hydrodynamic model timestep (e.g. time betweem ROMS model predictions) [seconds]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/NCgridfile
entry.label: ROMS NetCDF model grid filename:
entry.help_brief: ROMS NetCDF model grid filename (Use the full path)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/prefix
entry.label: ROMS NetCDF input filename prefix:
entry.help_brief: ROMS NetCDF input filename prefix (Use the full path)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/suffix
entry.label: ROMS NetCDF input filename suffix:
entry.help_brief: ROMS NetCDF input filename suffix

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/filenum
entry.label: Number string for First NetCDF input filename:
entry.help_brief: Number string for First NetCDF input filename

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/numdigits
entry.label: Number of digits in number portion of filename:
entry.help_brief: Number of digits in number portion of filename (with leading zeros)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/startfile
entry.label: Switch to indicate this is the first file:
entry.help_brief: Switch to indicate this is the first file [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/modanum
entry.label: Switch to indicate ?????:
entry.help_brief: Switch to indicate ????? [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/ui
entry.label: U-grid dimension in x direction:
entry.help_brief: U-grid dimension in x direction

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/uj
entry.label: U-grid dimension in y direction:
entry.help_brief: U-grid dimension in y direction

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/vi
entry.label: V-grid dimension in x direction:
entry.help_brief: V-grid dimension in x direction

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/vj
entry.label: V-grid dimension in y direction:
entry.help_brief: V-grid dimension in y direction

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/rho_nodes
entry.label: Number of rho points (vi * uj):
entry.help_brief: Number of rho points (vi * uj)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/u_nodes
entry.label: Number of U points (ui * uj):
entry.help_brief: Number of U points (ui * uj)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/v_nodes
entry.label: Number of V points (vi * vj):
entry.help_brief: Number of V points (vi * vj)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/max_rho_elements
entry.label: Number of elements using 4 RHO points as corners:
entry.help_brief: Number of elements using 4 RHO points as corners

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/max_u_elements
entry.label: Number of elements using 4 U points as corners:
entry.help_brief: Number of elements using 4 U points as corners

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/max_v_elements
entry.label: Number of elements using 4 V points as corners:
entry.help_brief: Number of elements using 4 V points as corners

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/rho_elements
entry.label: RHO elements with at least one out of 4 corners with mask_rho=1:
entry.help_brief: RHO elements with at least one out of 4 corners with mask_rho=1

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/u_elements
entry.label: U elements with at least one out of 4 corners with mask_u=1:
entry.help_brief: U elements with at least one out of 4 corners with mask_u=1

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/v_elements
entry.label: V elements with at least one out of 4 corners with mask_v=1:
entry.help_brief: V elements with at least one out of 4 corners with mask_v=1

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/us
entry.label: Number of RHO grid s-levels in ROMS hydro model:
entry.help_brief: Number of RHO grid s-levels in ROMS hydro model

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/ws
entry.label: Number of W grid s-levels in ROMS hydro model:
entry.help_brief: Number of W grid s-levels in ROMS hydro model

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/tdim
entry.label: Number of timesteps per ROMS hydro predictions file:
entry.help_brief: Number of timesteps per ROMS hydro predictions file

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/hc
entry.label: Min depth used in ROMS S-level transformations:
entry.help_brief: Min depth used in ROMS S-level transformations

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/z0
entry.label: ROMS bed roughness parameter:
entry.help_brief: ROMS bed roughness parameter

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/UVmaskEdit
entry.label: Switch to use U and V masks for boundary module:
entry.help_brief: If TRUE, adjust U and V masks to add extra wet U and V elements. If FALSE, adjust RHO mask to change the boundaries and cut off.

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Vtransform
entry.label: Choice of vertical transformation equation:
entry.help_brief: Choice of vertical transformation equation for terrain-following coordinates [1, 2 or 3] Choices 1 and 2 are from ROMS. Choice 3 = Song/Haidvogel (1994) eqn.

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readZeta
entry.label: Read sea surf. height from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constZeta (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read sea surf. height from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constZeta (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constZeta
entry.label: Constant zeta value to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant zeta value to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readSalt
entry.label: Read salinity from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constSalt (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read salinity from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constSalt (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constSalt
entry.label: Constant salinity to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant salinity to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readTemp
entry.label: Read temperature from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constTemp (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read temperature from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constTemp (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constTemp
entry.label: Constant temperature to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant temperature to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readDens
entry.label: Read water density from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constDens (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read water density from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constDens (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constDens
entry.label: Constant water density to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant water density to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readU
entry.label: Read U-momentum from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constU (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read U-momentum from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constU (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constU
entry.label: Constant U-momentum to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant U-momentum to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readV
entry.label: Read V-momentum from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constV (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read V-momentum from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constV (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constV
entry.label: Constant V-momentum to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant V-momentum to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readW
entry.label: Read W-momentum from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constW (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read W-momentum from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constW (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constW
entry.label: Constant W-momentum to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant W-momentum to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/readAks
entry.label: Read salinity vert. diff. coeff. from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constAks (.FALSE.):
entry.help_brief: Read salinity vert. diff. coeff. from netCDF file (.TRUE.) or use constAks (.FALSE.)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/constAks
entry.label: Constant salinity vert. diff. coeff. to use if switch above is FALSE:
entry.help_brief: Constant salinity vert. diff. coeff. to use if switch above is FALSE

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/HTurbOn
entry.label: Switch to use horizontal turbulence:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use horizontal turbulence [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/VTurbOn
entry.label: Switch to use vertical turbulence:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use vertical turbulence [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/ConstantHTurb
entry.label: Constant value of horizontal turbulence:
entry.help_brief: Constant value of horizontal turbulence [m2/s]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Behavior
entry.label: Choice of behavior type:
entry.help_brief: Choice of behavior type [0=Passive, 1=Near-surface, 2=Near-bottom, 3=DVM, 4=C.virginica oyster larvae, 5=C.ariakensis oyster larvae, 6=constant, 7=Tidal stream transport, 8=oil droplets]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/OpenOceanBoundary
entry.label: Switch to alllow particles to get stuck on open boundaries :
entry.help_brief: Switch to allow particles to get stuck on open boundaries? [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/deadage
entry.label: Age at which particle stops moving (i.e. dies):
entry.help_brief: Age at which particle stops moving (i.e. dies) [seconds] (applies to all behavior types)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/pediage
entry.label: Age when particle reaches max swim speed and can settle:
entry.help_brief: Age when particle reaches max swim speed and can settle [seconds]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/swimstart
entry.label: Age that swimming or sinking begins:
entry.help_brief: Age that swimming or sinking begins [seconds]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/swimslow
entry.label: Swimming speed when particles begin to swim:
entry.help_brief: Swimming speed when particles begin to swim [m/s]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/swimfast
entry.label: Maximum swimming speed:
entry.help_brief: Maximum swimming speed [m/s]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Sgradient
entry.label: Salinity gradient threshold that cues larval behavior:
entry.help_brief: Salinity gradient threshold that cues larval behavior [PSU/m] (only for behavior types 4 and 5)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/sink
entry.label: Sinking velocity for behavior type 6:
entry.help_brief: Sinking velocity for behavior type 6 only

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Hswimspeed
entry.label: Horizontal swimming speed for behavior type 7:
entry.help_brief: Horizontal swimming speed for behavior type 7 (Tidal Stream Transport) [m/s]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Swimdepth
entry.label: Depth at which fish swims during flood time, for behavior type 7:
entry.help_brief: Depth at which fish swims during flood time, for behavior type 7 (Tidal Stream Transport) [meters above bed]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/twistart
entry.label: Time of twilight start:
entry.help_brief: Time of twilight start [hour]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/twiend
entry.label: Time of twilight end:
entry.help_brief: Time of twilight end [hour]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/daylength
entry.label: Length of day:
entry.help_brief: Length of day [hour]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Em
entry.label: Irradiance at solar noon:
entry.help_brief: Irradiance at solar noon [microE m^-2 s^-1]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Kd
entry.label: Vertical attenuation coefficient:
entry.help_brief: Vertical attenuation coefficient [ ???? ]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/thresh
entry.label: Light threshold that cues behavior:
entry.help_brief: Light threshold that cues behavior [microE m^-2 s^-1]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/settlementon
entry.label: Switch to use settlement module:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use settlement module [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/holesExist
entry.label: Switch to allow holes in habitat:
entry.help_brief: Switch to allow holes in habitat [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/habitatfile
entry.label: Habitat polygon filename:
entry.help_brief: Habitat polygon filename

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/minpolyid
entry.label: Minimum habitat polygon ID number:
entry.help_brief: Minimum habitat polygon ID number

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/maxpolyid
entry.label: Maximum habitat polygon ID number:
entry.help_brief: Maximum habitat polygon ID number

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/pedges
entry.label: Number of habitat polygon edge points:
entry.help_brief: Number of habitat polygon edge points (# of rows in habitat polygon file)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/holefile
entry.label: Holes in habitat filename:
entry.help_brief: Holes in habitat filename

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/minholeid
entry.label: Minimum hole ID number:
entry.help_brief: Minimum hole ID number

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/maxholeid
entry.label: Maximum hole ID number:
entry.help_brief: Maximum hole ID number

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/hedges
entry.label: Number of hole edge points:
entry.help_brief: Number of hole edge points (# of rows in holes file)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/interfacial
entry.label: Interfacial tension for oil [N/m]:
entry.help_brief: Interfacial tension for oil [N/m]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/oilAging
entry.label: Switch to turn on oil aging:
entry.help_brief: Switch to turn on oil aging [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/diameterAgeRate
entry.label: Rate at which droplet diameter decreases:
entry.help_brief: Rate at which droplet diameter decreases [m/s]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/densityAgeRate
entry.label: Rate at which droplet density increases:
entry.help_brief: Rate at which droplet density increases [kg/(m3 * s)]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Earth_Radius
entry.label: Equatorial radius of the Earth [m]:
entry.help_brief: Equatorial radius of the Earth [m]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/MercatorProjection
entry.label: Switch to use Mercator projection from SEAGRID:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use Mercator projection from SEAGRID [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/latmin
entry.label: Minimum latitude value:
entry.help_brief: Minimum latitude value (only used if Mercator switch is FALSE)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/lonmin
entry.label: Minimum longitude value:
entry.help_brief: Minimum longitude value (only used if Mercator switch is FALSE)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/Earth_Radius
entry.label: Equatorial radius of the Earth [m]:
entry.help_brief: Equatorial radius of the Earth [m]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/PI
entry.label: Value to use for the number PI:
entry.help_brief: Value to use for the number PI

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/seed
entry.label: Seed for random number generator:
entry.help_brief: Seed for random number generator (Mersenne Twister)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/BoundaryBLNs
entry.label: Switch to create Surfer Blanking Files of boundaries:
entry.help_brief: Switch to create Surfer Blanking Files of boundaries [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/SaltTempOn
entry.label: Switch to compute salinity and temp. at particle location:
entry.help_brief: Switch to compute salinity and temp. at particle location [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/ijbuff
entry.label: Number of extra elements to read in on every side of particles:
entry.help_brief: Number of extra elements to read in on every side of particles

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/outpath
entry.label: Output directory:
entry.help_brief: Output directory

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/NCOutFile
entry.label: LTRANS output file (netCDF):
entry.help_brief: LTRANS output file (netCDF)

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/iprint
entry.label: Print interval for LTRANS output:
entry.help_brief: Print interval for LTRANS output (e.g. 3600 = every hour) [seconds]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/outpathGiven
entry.label: Switch to use output directory:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use output directory [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/writeCSV
entry.label: Switch to write output to CSV files:
entry.help_brief: Switch to write output to CSV files [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.name: /LTRANS/Input/Var/writeNC
entry.label: Switch to write output to NetCDF files:
entry.help_brief: Switch to write output to NetCDF files [.TRUE. or .FALSE.]

entry.label: Model name:
entry.help_brief: Name of the model

entry.name: /LTRANS/ModelAuthor
entry.label: Author name:
entry.help_brief: Name of the model author
